channel.description: Recent content in typescript on Phelipe Teles

item.title: Automating svg to jsx conversion with svgr
item.description: I found that getting svg files from Figma ready to be used in your React applications can be a bottleneck and prone to error.

item.title: Migrating from create-react-app to Vite
item.description: I started to learn React with create-react-app like everyone else, and it really does its job well. I never had to worry too much about tooling but… it is slow to start up.
